references.paper_title: Neural 3D video synthesis from multi-view video
references.reason: This paper introduces the Neural 3D Video (N3DV) dataset, a key dataset used for evaluating the performance of the proposed HiCoM framework.

references.paper_title: Streaming radiance fields for 3D video synthesis
references.reason: This paper proposes the StreamRF framework, a key competitor to HiCoM, allowing for a direct comparison of their performance.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This seminal paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), which are fundamental to the field and provide foundational concepts used in 3D Gaussian Splatting and HiCoM.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting, a core component of the HiCoM framework, and provides details on its implementation and optimization.

references.paper_title: 3DGStream: On-the-fly training of 3D Gaussians for efficient streaming of photo-realistic free-viewpoint videos
references.reason: This paper introduces the 3DGStream framework, another key competitor to HiCoM, and directly compares against it in the experimental results.
